page.title: 16People using the scrap yard
page.content: We interviewed some of the people who go to the yard.They all stated that they use the yard for odd pieces of cars which they would find more expensive to buy brand new. Most of those people interviewed buy small things,items like door handles from the 200 to 400 cars that are on the premises. We were told the yard makes the most sales on tyres,which are cheaper than new tyres.The manager said that people buying them come in for two or four much more often than the odd one. The manager stated that the yard is at its busiest at weekends,when they may get up to 500 or 600 customers.
